message:
BSF pick up two Bangladeshi schoolboys

Members of BSF (Border Security Force) held two schoolboys from Gorakmondol border area of Fulbari upazila in Kurigram Friday night.
 
The two were identified as Al Amin, an eighth grader and son Abu Hossain, and Mizanur Rahman, a student of class seven and son of Islam Ali.
 
Sources say BSF picked the two up as they unintentionally entered the No Man’s Land at around 09:00pm Friday.
 
BGB (Border Guard Bangladesh) Commander Shahiduzzaman confirmed the incident and said steps were under way to bring them back.
